abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of eight organizations supported by New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, contributes $300 to help Abdou and Ramata Travare pay back rent for their Bronx apartment.

headline.print_headline: Giving Up Almost Everything to Care for His Wife? ‘I See It as a Pleasure’
headline.main: Giving Up ‘Mostly Everything’ to Care for His Wife

keywords.value: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York
keywords.name: organizations

keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: When Abdou Travare’s wife, Ramata, learned she had dementia, he quit his job to be by her side. His savings have dwindled, and he has struggled to pay the rent....
lead_paragraph: When Abdou Travare’s wife, Ramata, learned she had dementia, he quit his job to be by her side. His savings have dwindled, and he has struggled to pay the rent.
